name: alfred-ai
description: Alfred AI - Backend and CLI application

scripts.dev: echo 'Choose which service to run:' && echo '  npm run dev:backend  - Start the backend server' && echo '  npm run dev:cli      - Start the CLI application'
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:cli
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../cli && npm install
